caption.title: Effect of population size and stratification.
caption.p: In (a), outbreak risk (red, left axis) and impact (black, right axis) are plotted with respect to human population size. In (b), outbreak risk (red, left axis) and impact (black, right axis) are plotted with respect to the connectivity, q, of 10000 people equally distributed in 10 patches (see text). Solid lines indicate median and shades indicate 95% range.
